name: Won't Finish That Either
description:
What i want:

Customizable bikes (different tires, wheels, suspension and frames all with it's own physical parameters based on a real world parts)

Career mode, work as postal boy, currier or stuntman to earn hard cash for bike upgrades, participate in championships to leave your mark on the face of the online scoreboard.

RPG elements, gain or lose weight, stamina, cadence and such.

What i have:

Working (partially) suspension! Sick tricks! Cuhraaaazy whacky physics!

R - restarts level.

Right arrow - tap to accelerate.

Left arrow - hold to break.

Up arrow - pitch upwards.

Down arrow - pitch downwards.
